name: vectors
description: AI-assisted vector editor with Rust/WASM backend

scripts.engine:build: export RUSTUP_HOME=$PWD/.rustup_home && export CARGO_HOME=$PWD/.cargo_home && cd engine && cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release && ../.cargo_home/bin/wasm-bindgen target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/engine.wasm --out-dir ../web/src/pkg --target web
scripts.web:build: npm run engine:build && cd web && npm run build
